standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no vesting or cliff period for founder equity
standard_clauses.plain_english: Founder equity should have a vesting schedule with cliff period.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: संस्थापक इक्विटी में क्लिफ अवधि के साथ वेस्टिंग शेड्यूल होना चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Founder shares shall vest over 4 years with a 1-year cliff.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: full ratchet anti-dilution unfavorable to founders
standard_clauses.plain_english: Anti-dilution terms should use weighted average, not full ratchet.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: एंटी-डाइल्यूशन शर्तों में भारित औसत का उपयोग होना चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Anti-dilution protection shall be on a weighted average basis.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: participating preferred with more than 1x liquidation preference
standard_clauses.template_clause: Investors shall have a non-participating 1x liquidation preference.

standard_clauses.plain_english: Founders should retain board control in early stages.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: प्रारंभिक चरणों में संस्थापकों को बोर्ड नियंत्रण बनाए रखना चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Board shall consist of [X] Founder directors and [Y] Investor directors.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: drag along triggered at very low thresholds
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: ड्रैग-अलॉन्ग के लिए अधिसंख्य अनुमोदन आवश्यक होना चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Drag-along rights shall require approval of 75% of shareholders.
